subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Brian Gay played his way into this week’s United States Open in his last possible chance, completing a wire-to-wire victory Sunday in the St. Jude Classic in Memphis, Tenn.
snippet: Brian Gay played his way into this week’s United States Open in his last possible chance, completing a wire-to-wire victory Sunday in the St. Jude Classic in Memphis, Tenn.
